sub_title: Senior Customer Success Engineer at Rubrik
summary:
I have solid and strong customer service and system support experience which had been  performed at different vendors like NetApp EMC, GE, NEC, etc. and also from different departmental aspects like customer service, project management and system engineering. 

Merging these experiences and aspects into one creates a strong knowledge and experience at my customer and project support approach.

I am passionate about having responsibilities, team-work and being a leader to the team.

awards.title: Commune Special Award
awards.description:
Tumbler Candle - No Falling Candle

At the "Invention Contest" of TUBİTAK, I got the "Commune Special Award" (Most Liked Invention by Commune)

projects.title: Reklam Karesi
projects.description:
Reklam Karesi is a social responsibility project that is derived from the million dollar homepage concept. 

There are a million pixels for sale at the web site and also because this is an upgraded version of the concept there are other grids that can contain more pixels so more advertisement. Also the companies can create their own grids, if needed.

The difference of Reklam Karesi among others at this concept is that this project is not made for any revenue. %80 of the money earned from this project will be donated to the children and health care foundations. Remaining %20 will be counted as expenses and marketing.

contributors.headline: Senior Customer Success Engineer at Rubrik

projects.title: ProsMedya
projects.description:
ProsMedya is a social media digger, achiever, analyzer and reporter tool. 

With ProsMedya, companies can request to get tweets about some keyword stored and archieved in a database and also analyzed by a high experienced team for 7 x 24, live. With www.prosmedya.com website interface the companies can sign in their account and examine their social media status of their own. In case of user need, the customer can assign some workers to analyze their own tweets.

These reports and analyze results are shown at user friendly graphical user interface with the explanations. Furthermore, these reports can be downloaded as .PDF files.

contributors.headline: Senior Customer Success Engineer at Rubrik

profile_positions.description:
Providing technical support to customers, customer support personnel, and field support staff, focused on diagnosing, troubleshooting, repairing and debugging the NetApp SolidFire and HCI product lines. Support incidents ranges from various hardware and/or software issues with SolidFire/HCI storage systems and solutions, to multi-system, multi-vendor, and multi-network interoperability issues.

This job also includes but not limited to other activities such as creating new knowledge base articles and best practices, sharing them with other Technical Support Center staff and learning about new technologies on a regular basis.

Another important part of this role is to collaborate with other Technical Support Engineers to facilitate best and reliable solutions for customers in a timely manner. This includes getting involved in various technical/nontechnical projects.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Engineer

profile_positions.description:
At this job, I am responsible of delivering the information technology systems projects and troubleshooting the occurring problems at our customer’s (mainly public government establishments) site, mainly focusing on virtualisation and data storage technologies.

This job definition includes designing system that is to be offered upon customer’s requirements, implementing and delivering it. After the successful delivery, I am also responsible to troubleshooting problems if any occurs or consulting the customer to solve their problems and for their needs.

I am mostly focused on virtualization, data storage technologies and operating system (both windows and Linux) management.
profile_positions.title: Systems Expert

profile_positions.description:
At this role (as a contractor employee from LN Computer Systems) I am responsible for installing, managing, administrating and troubleshooting the VMware virtualization systems and data storage devices which are installed at the site in a Tier-3 datacenter at the customer site.

I am working full time and on site at our customer, Ministry of Environment And Urbanism. My daily routine includes creating new virtual machines as desired, managing, optimizing and troubleshooting the existing virtual machines, deploying storage operations from many tiers like data storage tier, SVC tier and virtualization tier. Within this scope I am administrating many technologies including VMWare 6.5, IBM SVC, IBM TPC, vRealize Operations and also administrating data storage devices including but not limited to EMC VNX, EMC Isilon, HP 3PAR, IBM PureApp, Fujitsu Eternus, Hitachi HUSVM and G1000.

Also at this job, I am responsible for customizing and deploying daily, weekly views and reports from VMWare vRealize Operations Manager. With the outcome of this, I am optimizing the VMs created for the best use of resources.
profile_positions.title: Virtualization and Storage Engineer

profile_positions.description:
In this role at Professional Services department of Dell EMC (as a contractor employee from Solus Information Technologies) which I previously worked for another department as a head count employee, I am responsible for preparing and delivering the data storage devices to the customer by configuring them in terms of customer’s special needs and plans which they had the physical installation completed before.

Within this scope, to assure to 7x24 business continuity I work as an on-site resident engineer with providing configuration changes, support, trouble shooting and tracking & escalating cases at our customer Turk Telekom which has one of the largest and comprehensive install base and also owns several data centers of the biggest data centers in Turkey. Within this scope I give support mostly the data storage arrays VNX and VMAX, and also other Dell EMC products like management systems of these arrays, Recoverpoint Replication devices, ESRS servers and Policy Managers.

In addition to the support I provide for data storage devices within this service, I also provide configuration, problem solving and support to devices (switches and directors) on the SAN (Storage Area Network) to which these devices are connected to. Within this I give support to Cisco and Brocade switches, directors and their management software.

Upon the customers' decision not to continue with this onsite residency service after 9 years of uninterrupted operation, I left the company as I was hired as an outsourced employee for this positon.
profile_positions.title: Implementation Specialist

profile_positions.description:
At this job my responsibility is to implement, support, troubleshoot and maintain ADMS (Advanced Distribution Management System) product PowerOn and GIS product SmallWorld which are installed both local and global customer sites. 

My main responsibility is to troubleshoot and support our customers' customized product in terms of the operating system failures (Linux), database problems and discrepancies (Oracle) and application itself to ensure 7x24 business continuity on their site with the product. These customers includes 2 local and 15 global customers which are supplying electricity to more than one hundred million people.

Besides those I also get involved into the implementation stages with the project team for new projects' installation and configuration phases.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Engineer

profile_positions.description:
My job includes installation of EMC products to customer sites, trouble shooting them in case of any failure by myself or with the support of the engineering team, and make necessary hardware replacements needed for the problem, for the hardware failures that my customer is facing.

Most of the time my job is to keep my customers satisfied by managing the service request and solution process smoothly by concluding it fast and solid with reliable results. This includes both working with extra hours and developing good relationship with my customers. Also at this trouble shooting process I manage the relationship between my customer and the support team from all around the world.

Besides daily trouble shooting issues, I am also responsible for some minor and major projects managements.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Engineer

profile_positions.description:
My job at NEC, giving support to the company’s IT systems that contains biometric solutions. During my duty at this company I worked as team leader and system administrator positions at the maintenance of the NEC AFIS (Automated Fingerprint Identification System) system which is installed at EGM (Headquarters of Security) Criminal Police Laboratories.

During my duty at this job alongside of the management of the support which is given to more than 200 workstations installed at 81 province, I was also responsible of conducting daily procedures at the central system, approving daily reports, troubleshooting potential or existing problems and installation/maintenance and administration of the new software that are developed upon request from customer. 

Alongside of the technical tasks, I was also responsible for arranging/managing the communication and coordination with the third party companies for the problems occurred at the system and arranging/conducting the regular meetings with the customer.

During this job I was the manager and the team leader of the technician team consists of two persons.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I worked as a system application expert in shifts at the Linux based CBS (Central Betting System) that is housing Turkey’s IDDAA and Azerbaijan’s TOPAZ sport betting systems and which is serving average of 10 million coupon data over more than 5000 stable, more than 1000 mobile and 6 electronic agents. 

I performed daily opening and closing procedures, constant and regular jobs (for example operating or stopping operation of a dealer or regulating limits) and giving support to the personnel that are working at helpdesk which are contacting to dealers directly.

Besides these daily procedures, I accomplished monitoring the central system constantly, preventing and troubleshooting potential problems or solving the problems after they occur within my scope of authority. At these problem solving phases I worked with engineering and technician teams coordinately with giving or taking support from them.

Except for these tasks, I worked at the constant and regular testing activities for the new software and hardware developed.
profile_positions.title: System Applications Expert

profile_positions.description: Customizing the Moodle system for customers, generating and improving the contents of this custom Moodle systems.
profile_positions.title: Intern
